scenario_text.value:
Wh-what was that thing?! If it attacks us
again, we’re all dead meat!

Ryo, relax. We got through it last time, and
we’ll get through it again.

No way! You’re foolin’ yourself! Next time we
might not be so lucky!

We...we could all be d-dead before we know
it!

Eek! D-didn’t I tell you to keep away from
me?!

(Ryo seems pretty scared, but...as long as he
stays with us, we can protect him...right?)

Oh, this is the worst! I can’t believe this
is happening!
